Question:
Does RA8D1 support a reduced pin count display interface?
Answer:
RA8D1 Group MCUs support the MIPI-DSI interface, in addition to the parallel RGB interface. This low pin count interface is based on the MIPI D-PHY Specification Version 2.1, defined by the MIPI Alliance and supports connection to  MIPI compliant displays. The RA8D1 supports 2-lane MIPI-DSI, with each lane running up to 720Mbps. Internal 2MB flash and interface to external flash are also available for storage of graphics assets. 
Suitable Products
RA8D1
